Dear {!Account.Name} Team,
It was a pleasure speaking with you and I look forward to working with you in the future. As your VinPro, I will be your dealership's advocate. It is my responsibility to provide assistance with any escalated issues you may experience and to help you fully utilize the system. In an effort to ensure you receive a timely response, please consider emailing me if I'm unavailable via phone.
Support related issues can be submitted via Email, Customer Portal or by Phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com
Phone: 1-800-980-7488 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-4pm CST)
Customer Portal: The Portal is where you can create a ticket and find solutions to frequently asked questions.
In order to better assist you, please make sure you create a ticket with the support department and send me an email with the ticket number. By providing me this information, I can follow the ticket and make sure it gets resolved in a timely fashion.
I look forward to speaking with you soon. Please remember if you can't reach me by phone, you can email me. Also, if you have a support related issue you will need to create a ticket and email me the ticket number so I can follow up on the progress. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Once again, Welcome to VinSolutions!

In addition to sales I was responsible for maintaining and updating the dealership website and working with 3rd party vendors to maximize exposure and ROI. I also have a degree in Network Systems Administration from DeVry University.
